pages.text: If you have a strategy that heavily relies on a certain ship's active ability, you can use this mothership to protect it.

Protect a ship, multiple uses. Any time the protected ship is attacked, register a miss on the board and add the damage of the shot to interceptor's internal buffer. Protection lasts until this ship is destroyed.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: When the combined damage of this ship and the internal buffer reaches 9, destroy this ship and mark all intercepted tiles as neutral.
pages.title: Passive Ability
